#Counts of Order Hour of Day
```{r}
orders <- orders %>% mutate(order_hour_of_day = as.numeric(order_hour_of_day), eval_set = as.factor(eval_set))

orders %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=order_hour_of_day)) + 
  geom_histogram(stat="count",fill="red")
```
